# Course Overview

This document will include important links and course notes for 16:790:677:01: Maximum Likelihood Estimation.

  - This will be updated throughout the semester with new content. This initial content in Chapters 2 and 3 is optional, but encouraged, and includes tutorials and resources for basics in R and mathematical concepts used in the course.
  - This is a new and living document. If you spot errors or have questions or suggestions, please email me at k.mccabe@rutgers.edu.
